id.description: Must provide an id to match with a label

aria-describedby.description: Optional id to pair the input to its help text

aria-labelledby.description: Optional id to pair the input to its label text (if not using a regular label with `htmlFor`)

element.description: Overrides the default element name to apply unique styles with the Customization Provider

hasError.description: Shows error styling on the Slider

hideRangeLabels.description: Hides the min and max values that appear over the slider

i18nMaxRangeLabel.description: Used to internationlize the max range label.

i18nMinRangeLabel.description: Used to internationlize the min range label.

maxValue.description: The largest number in the slider range

minValue.description: The smallest number in the slider range

numberFormatter.description:
Used to adjust how the numbers are rendered and interpreted.
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Intl/NumberFormat

onChange.description: Fired on every change as the thumb is dragged along the track.

onChangeEnd.description: Fired at the end of the dragging event once.

step.description: The incremented value as you drag along the range
